name: Meteor Rain (ME GAMES)
description:
Watch out for the meteors that can kill you, collect as many coins as possible and reach the best high-score in Meteor Rain! How? The mechanics are pretty simple. Just tap on the screen to slow down your cube's speed! Why don't you play it yet?!
*For Android OS

If you like the game, you could help us rating it! Thank you!

You can also get it from the Aptoide appstore: https://com-megamesstudio-meteorrain.ro.aptoide.com/app
